mapper.insert: insert into tp_cart_gift (gift_name, create_time, add_time, gift_type, status, money, user_id, card_list_id, report_id, mess, orderid, mobile, taskid, obtain, user_time) values (#{gift_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{add_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gift_type,jdbcType=BIT}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{card_list_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{report_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obtain,jdbcType=BIT}, #{user_time,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update tp_cart_gift set gift_name = #{gift_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_time = #{add_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gift_type = #{gift_type,jdbcType=BIT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, card_list_id = #{card_list_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, report_id = #{report_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mess = #{mess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderid = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, taskid = #{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, obtain = #{obtain,jdbcType=BIT}, user_time = #{user_time,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, gift_name, create_time, add_time, gift_type, status, money, user_id, card_list_id, report_id, mess, orderid, mobile, taskid, obtain, user_time from tp_cart_gift where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, gift_name, create_time, add_time, gift_type, status, money, user_id, card_list_id, report_id, mess, orderid, mobile, taskid, obtain, user_time from tp_cart_gift
select count(id) from tp_cart_gift where user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT * from tp_cart_gift where user_id = #{user_id} and status = 2 and obtain = 2
